Package com.poesys.bs.delegate

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDataDelegate<T extends IDto<S>,S extends com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto,K extends com.poesys.db.pk.IPrimaryKey>
    An interface for the business delegates in the application that require a database connection and managed transactions.
    IReadOnlyDataDelegate<T extends IDto<S>,S extends com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto,K extends com.poesys.db.pk.IPrimaryKey>
    An interface for the business delegates in the application that require a database connection and managed transactions for a read-only table.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConnectionDelegate
    An abstract base class for the business delegates in the application that require a database connection and managed transactions.
    AbstractDaoDelegate<S extends com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto>
    An abstract base class that implements the IDataDelegate interface for the JDBC-based business delegates in the application that require a JDBC database connection and DAOs.
    AbstractDataDelegate<T extends IDto<S>,S extends com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto,K extends com.poesys.db.pk.IPrimaryKey>
    An abstract base class that implements the IDataDelegate interface for the JDBC-based business delegates in the application that require a JDBC database connection and managed transactions.
    AbstractIdentityDataDelegate<T extends IDto<S>,S extends com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto,K extends com.poesys.db.pk.IPrimaryKey>
    An abstract subclass of the AbstractDataDelegate for the JDBC-based business delegates in the application that require a JDBC database connection and managed transactions and that also have an identity or auto-generated primary key.
    AbstractReadOnlyDataDelegate<T extends IDto<S>,S extends com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto,K extends com.poesys.db.pk.IPrimaryKey>
    An abstract base class that implements the IDataDelegate interface for the JDBC-based business delegates in the application that require a JDBC database connection and managed transactions.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DelegateException
    Standard exception for the business layer.
